message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'll love. I'm asking for $100 for it. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I can only pay up to $90. Let me know if that works for you!
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a little closer to my asking price. How about $95? It's a great deal for you, and I'm sure you'll love the product!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still looking for something closer to $85. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us!
Bob, I understand you're looking for a lower price, but $85 is just a bit too low for me. I'm willing to go down to $90. It's a fair price for both of us, and I know you'll be happy with the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still looking for something closer to $87. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us!
Bob, I'm getting a little concerned we're not going to be able to agree on a price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $88. This is my final offer.  Let me know what you think.
